channel.title: Balloon bomb
channel.description:
[size=32pt][b][u]Balloon Bomb[/u][/b][/size]
Ever heard of a draino/the works bomb? well thats how you make hydrogen so just make one of those using this guide-adding link gimme a minute
[b][u]Things needed[/u][/b]
ok make one BUT don't put the cap on at all put a ballooon over the top of the bottle and shake the bottle until the balloon is inflated now take it off and tie the balloon DON'T LET GO!!! if you do it will float away because hydrogen is a lighter then air gas jsut like helium ok after you tie it shut get a long fuse and use that as the string and tie it to the balloon end light the fuse let it go and wait for it to reach the hydrogen filled balloon and make a HUGE flame ball thing
credits: me for being curious and whoever made the draino/theworks guide

item.title: Balloon bomb

item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:3, topic:140854”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=193063.msg1735763#msg1735763 date=1189129121]
Not exactly sure if you would call this a ‘hydrogen’ bomb, but good job.
[/quote] I guess theoretically you could, but practically the name is decieving.[/quote]

well i couldn’t think of any other name but it is hydrogen and its kinda like a bomb so… =/

Read full topic
